name: Hillside Choir of Death
description:
Ludum Dare 48 jam game. Theme: "Deeper and Deeper"

Goal:

Your chorus is performing on top of a hill. You need to help them hit the right notes, but you are armed only with a shovel.

Use that shovel too much and choir singers will die.

Hit enough notes to successfully have the chorus sing the song.

Controls:

  • Mouse over a click a block of ground to dig that column of ground.
  • A singer hits a note when the note overlaps them (like a rhythm game).
  • Dig different parts of the hill so that your singers can hit enough notes.

Scoring

  • Most notes = 1 Point.
  • EXCEPT Notes on the bottom row. They are worth 2 Points.
  • Score enough points without all of your singers dying or running out of notes.

AUDIO NOTE

  • This is a rhythm game without rhythm. But when you successfully sing a note there is a little sfx that changes pitch based on how high/low the note is. GET IT BECAUSE OF THE THEME
